name: Amaretti
description: /'From amaro or bitter'/ Amaretti are all about texture and flavor, crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside and with a slight bitterness from the almonds. Three core ingredients: almond, sugar, egg whites.

ingredients: 70 g sugar (experiment with less sugar next time, reminder)

instructions: - If the almonds aren't ground up, I try to do as best as I can with a blender. Tends to get stuck. Buying almond meal is possible in many places though. It's possible you can also use a mortar and pestle
- Whisk the egg white a little on one side and on the other mix the almond and sugar, then combine and mix with your hands well.
- Prepare a plate with icing sugar and make balls using the measure of a full teaspoon. Roll the balls on the sugar and place on the baking tray. Press lightly on each with two fingers

culinary: The more ground up is the almond, the better.
